description:
This application will extend your wallpaper with the latest exchange rate and precious metal charts. 

Wallpaper Extension (ER&PM) is very intuitive and simple to use. You can set the refresh interval from two minutes up to 24 hours or turn it off. An automatic refresh at midnight is also possible. The refresh process requires a internet connection to download the charts. All charts are powered by KITCO.

There are many reasons why you could be interested in the latest precious metal prices and currency exchange rates. For example as an gold owner, this is the ultimative must-have application for your HP Touchpad.

Within the app you can choose the following charts:
Australian Dollar vs US Dollar, 
Brazilian Real vs US Dollar, 
British Pounds vs US Dollar, 
Canadian Dollar vs US Dollar, 
Euro vs US Dollar, 
Indian Rupee vs US Dollar, 
Japanese Yen vs US Dollar, 
Mexican Pesos vs US Dollar, 
Russian Ruble vs US Dollar, 
South Africa Rand vs US Dollar,  
Swiss Franc vs US Dollar,  
Gold, Silver, Platinum or Palladium Chart in USD, AUD, JPY, RMB, EUR, CHF, GBP, INR, ZAR, BRL per kilo or ounce.

You can download Wallpaper Extension right now for the low cost of almost nothing. If you'll running into trouble, we are pleased to help you seven days a week via email.
